short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple notepad with bold, italic and underline to be used as a Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click on the icon and the notepad popup will show up.
You can type your notes and everything will be stored in the chrome storage for the next time you'll need.

Select the words to change and execute these commands:
Ctrl+B = Bold
Ctrl+U = Underline
Ctrl+I = Italic
